scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && npm run build:native && npm run build:node
scripts.build:native: shx rm -rf dist/native && rollup -c rollup.config.js && shx mkdir -p dist/native/types && shx cp dist/types/cryptico.d.ts dist/native/types/ && shx cp package.json dist/native && shx cp README.md dist/native
scripts.build:node: shx rm -rf dist/node && rollup -c rollup.config.js --environment NODEJS && shx mkdir dist/node/types && shx cp dist/types/cryptico.d.ts dist/native/types/ && shx cp package.json dist/node && rjp dist/node/package.json name @daotl/cryptico-node && shx cp README.md dist/node
scripts.pub: npm run lint && npm run pub:native && npm run pub:node
scripts.pub:native: cd dist/native && npm publish --access public && cd ../..
scripts.pub:node: cd dist/node && npm publish --access public && cd ../..
